net.proteusframework.users.authentication

Class ClearSessionAndRedirectFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.users.authentication.ClearSessionAndRedirectFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class ClearSessionAndRedirectFilter
extends Object
implements Filter
    Clears any existing HTTP session and redirects to a specified URL.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)
